description: rectangular mirror with frame with curvilinear edging at top, bottom and corners; gilt organic medallion above mirror; gilt band around mirror pane
markings: \'Made by Walter C. Briggs, 4540/Fremont Av. South, Minneapolis, Minn,/during the winter of 1956-1957. Copied/from a photograph #2903 (\'Late Queen Ann/date 1740-1760\') in Wallace Nutting\'s/Furniture Treasury, Vol. II. Cost of/materials-$24.65.\', typed on sticker, on back
title: Mirror
